found only in the ambulacral groove of Oreaster occidentalis by S&R, but known to be a symbiont in several Gulf sea stars

there are 4 species of Odontosyllis known from the Gulf: O. heterodonta, O. phosphorea, O. polycera, O. undecimdonta; the last was described and named by Olga Hartman in 1964, who identified the S&R polychaetes
